name: ionic-cross-platform-boilerplate
title: Cross platform apps with Ionic
description: Ionic boilerplate to create cross platform apps (ios, android, mobile, web and desktop). Written in TypeScript and Powered by Webpack!

scripts.browser: npm run dumpdev -- --config webpack.config.browser.js && cordova run browser
scripts.desktop: npm run dumpdev -- --config webpack.config.desktop.js  && cordova build browser && electron ./platforms/browser/www/index.desktop.js
scripts.android: npm run dumpdev -- --config webpack.config.android.js  && cordova run android
scripts.iosEmulator: npm run dumpdev -- --config webpack.config.ios.js  && cordova run ios
scripts.ios: npm run dumpdev -- --config webpack.config.ios.js  && cordova run ios --device
